library.description: reveal.js is a framework for easily creating beautiful presentations using HTML. You'll need a browser with support for CSS 3D transforms to see it in its full glory.
library.name: reveal.js

library.description: It's a presentation framework based on the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions in modern browsers and inspired by the idea behind prezi.com
library.name: impress.js

library.description:
Modern HTML Presentations
A JavaScript library for building modern HTML presentations. deck.js is flexible enough to let advanced CSS and JavaScript authors craft highly customized decks, but also provides templates and themes for the HTML novice to build a standard slideshow.
library.name: deck.js

library.description: Cross-browser HTML5 presentation template.
library.name: Shower

library.description: ShowOff is a Sinatra web app that reads simple configuration files for a presentation. It is sort of like a Keynote web app engine - think S5 + Slidedown. I am using it to do all my talks in 2010, because I have a deep hatred in my heart for Keynote and yet it is by far the best in the field.
library.name: ShowOff

library.description:
DIY Presentation Micro-Framework

Less than 1KB minified and gzipped, with no dependencies.

Bespoke.js provides the foundation, then gets out of your way so you can focus on uniquely crafting your own personal deck style.
library.name: Bespoke.js

library.description:
A jQuery plugin to build a website on the infinite canvas.

Started as a jQuery port of impress.js and utilizes the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions in modern browsers.
library.name: jmpress.js

library.description: Landslide generates a slideshow using the slides that power the html5-slides presentation. Requires Python  with jinja2 and pygments modules for code blocks syntax coloration.
library.name: Landslide

library.description:
CSS-based SlideShow System
A simple framework for building presentations with modern web standards
An HTML file contains the whole presentation
Themes as CSS files
JavaScript handles what CSS can't (keyboard shortcuts etc)
Warning: Only works in latest Firefox, Opera, Safari or Chrome.
library.name: csss

library.description: 30-second Slideshows for Hackers
library.name: Cleaver

library.description: A jQuery plugin for making scrolling presentation decks
library.name: scrolldeck.js

library.description: A framework for easily build HTML presentations or websites.
library.name: Flowtime.js

library.description:
Present JavaScript in its native environment.

If you're making a presentation on JavaScript, make it in JavaScript.
library.name: Fathom.js

library.description:
Presenteer.js is a flexible HTML5 presentation tool that uses CSS3 transforms and transitions to make smooth HTML presentations.
Works on Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Android, iPhone and IE9.
library.name: Presenteer.js

library.description:
A web app for creating zooming presentations, similar to Prezi, but in HTML5.

Info
Awwation is an app that allows you to create Prezi-like presentations in the browser. Presentations are SVG files that are animated using Javascript.
library.name: Awwation

library.description: A javascript library for synchronizing videos and slides.
library.name: Presentz

library.description: Slide Show/Presentation Templates Using HTML, CSS & JavaScript (w/ jQuery)
library.name: S6

library.description: Framework for creating live, dynamic, and interactive collages. Collage.js brings together many public APIs, along a method of presenting media within a limitless two-dimesional space to create memorable experiences.
library.name: Collage

library.description: A jQuery Mobile framework for creating real-time presentations.
library.name: tacion.js

library.description: {text-overflow: ellipsis;} on steroids
library.name: HoverForMore.js

library.description: Yet another JavaScript slide framework
library.name: perkele.js

library.description: HTML5 Slider is an amazing framework for HTML presentations on the iPad.
library.name: HTML5-Slider

library.description: A Google HTML5 slide template
library.name: html5slides

library.description:
HTML Slidy: Slide Shows in HTML and XHTML
You can now create accessible slide shows with ease
library.name: HTML Slidy

library.description: HTML5 slide template for Google I/O 2012
library.name: io-2012-slides

library.description: HTML5 Slides for Google I/O 2013.
